hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT idLessonTest,idlesson,numQuestions,numAnswers,multiplechoice,IFNULL(td.idlessontest,0)>0 as draft FROM tlessontest LEFT JOIN tlessontestdraft td USING (idlessontest) WHERE idLessonTest = ?;
SELECT idQuestion FROM tquestion WHERE idLessonTest = ? ORDER BY priority;
UPDATE tquestion SET text = ?, priority = ? WHERE idQuestion = ?;
UPDATE tanswer SET text = ?, correct = ?, reason = ? WHERE idAnswer = ?;
